metadata.title: CVE-2024-48873 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: rtw89: check return value of ieee80211_probereq_get() for RNRThe return value of ieee80211_probereq_get() might be NULL, so check itbefore using to avoid NULL pointer access.Addresses-Coverity-ID: 1529805 ("Dereference null return value")

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
